item.title: Re: Beware Facebook Scammers: Bob, all of Facebook is a scam now with meta it's nothing but authcookies best I only use it for you maybe. The PGP part is down recall Virginia Wolff letters to a young patriot yet we hear Putin call out NAZI. It's all about Us now. You are all I got in this world. Two strangers in the bright lights. -bonheurrosa4
Beware Facebook Scammers: Note that this is our official Facebook page (@wiglenet), anything else is a scam: https://www.facebook.com/wiglenet/ -bobzilla
Re: Kismet Wardriving Mode: Awesome news, at last an easy way to strip it down for the underpowered SBCs. -strasharo

Kismet Wardriving Mode: holy wardriving, batman: https://www.kismetwireless.net/docs/readme/wardriving/ The incomparable dragorn has released a special wardriving overlay config for wardriving! -arkasha

Reminder: Query Limits and responsible use: Hey, apparently folks need to hear this again: every WiGLE user has a daily query limit associated with their account. This keeps the service available for everyone without costing $ALL_THE_MONEY. If you deploy code that REALLY doesn't respect your daily limit, we'll disable your account. If you try and register multiple of accounts to circumvent the limit, bad things will also happen. Also, if you're trying to use WiGLE data for commercial purposes, maybe contact us and help support the project. hugs, the WiGLE team -arkasha
Re: 20 years ago...: ccie4526 wrote: > Does this mean we're starting to become old farts? ;-) Yes. Yea it does. -ashleedawg
Search Outage: WiGLE had a partial search subsystem outage earlier today - apologies for the interruption in service. We have restored service and are analyzing the cause. -arkasha
Re: 20 years ago...: Does this mean we're starting to become old farts? ;-) -ccie4526
Re: Pixel update RQ3A.210905.001 breaks GPS: I downloaded the latest Wigle update and the problem appears to be fixed - thank you! -ecramp

Re: Pixel update RQ3A.210905.001 breaks GPS: Of course I came here after I installed the update and ran into the issue. ‚òπÔ∏è I also found that I had to turn off the Wi-Fi scan throttling developer option again after the update. I'm happy to try gathering debug data of that would help. -scarhill

Pixel update RQ3A.210905.001 breaks GPS: GPS no longer updates when the device is locked after upgrading Pixel devices to RQ3A.210905.001. (Android 11 September). Beware, upgrades will render your devices unusable for stumbling. We are researching options. -arkasha
Re: 20 years ago...: I don't even believe in networks! :) -SkywardLark

Re: 20 years ago...: Wow, how many sites have been around for 20 years!!! Great job guys. I've been uploading files since February of 2004 and will keep them coming in the future as well. Thanks!!! ü§ì -AZ_WD'er
Re: On _nomap and _optout: Hm. I wish we had a button for reporting spam. üôä -kurz
Re: 20 years ago...: So.Many.Dots. It's been a fun ride/drive/boat/walk, here's to 20 more! -pejacoby
